src_original: pūrvaṃ buddhaguṇādibhiḥ saṃprayuktāni /  ye cetyādinā buddhaguṇādinapyāha /

tgt_original: sarvadharmaiśvaryapāramiteti |  sarvākārajagadarthasampādanaśaknutā |  anabhibhūtaḥ sarvābhibhūriti māratīrthikādibhiratiraskṛtasteṣāñca kṛtābhibhavanaḥ |

src_original: anāvaraṇaṃ śuddhatvāt /  asaṅgamanapekṣatvāt /  apratihataṃ sarvasmin sarvākārajñeyapravṛtteḥ /
anupama tasyānumānāya viśeṣadṛṣṭāntabhāvāt /  parito 'vacchedaḥ parimāna(ṇam) /  aśeṣaviśeṣāntarāyāt rūpagrāhi pratyakṣam /
